task.summary: Default task

feat(PortalOcclusionCuller): Keep last camera check's visible tiles t… …o reduced SetActive calls
Before this change, we disable all the visible tiles from a previous camera check, and enable all found visible tiles in the current one.
This may produce calls where a tile is set to invisible and immediately set to visible in the same call.
With this change, we store the visible tiles from the previous check, so we can skip the tiles whose visibility didn't change.
Benchmark:
Setup: LC_Office with map seed 1 on Experimentation (Eclipsed); Entered through main entrance; Stay idle throughout benchmark.
Previous method: 345.38 stopwatch ticks per 20037 calls Current method: 206.89 stopwatch ticks per 20037 calls
Improvement: 40.09%
bugfix: When splitting a comma-separated string, trim spaces, then quotation marks
feat(Config): Include internal fallback list in InteriorsToSkipFallbackPortals description

refactor: Change AlwaysLog to LogAlways
This ensures naming consistency across the three logging methods

feat(Config): Force migration if version file doesn't exist
This defaults the version to 0.0.0, since the version file doesn't exist prior to this version
chore(version): Bump version, edit changelog

bugfix(Config): When migrating settings, read version from the assembly directory instead of vendor-provided path
This fixes a "path not found issue" when the mod is installed manually, due to us using a scaffolded directory provided by mod management tools.
chore(version): Bump version, edit changelog
chore(version): Bump version, edit changelog

chore(syntax): Format Config.cs
The previous commit had similar code aligned, which isn't consistent with the rest of the project.
refactor(syntax): Use var where applicable
refactor: In TeleportExtender.cs, rename playerGameplayCameraFarPlanes to _playerGameplayCameraFarPlanes for naming consistency
feat: Remove unused ObjectsInsideFactory field and related operations
refactor: In TeleportExtender, rename _playerGameplayCameraFarPlanes to _initialPlayerCameraFarPlanes
feat: Only allocate a new float array to _initialPlayerCameraFarPlanes if it's null
chore(version): Bump version, edit changelog
refactor: Move TileContentsBuilder to its own file

bugfix: Add null checks for lights and renderers
This fixes an issue on LCOffice where a renderer might get destroyed after generation
Benchmark: With null checks: `251.8254ms` / `10000 camera renders` Without null checks: `247.6951ms` / `10000 camera renders`
Difference: -1.67%
Setup: - Moon: Titan - Seed: 1 - Dungeon: LCOffice (v1.0.16) - Office Length Override: 20 - Benchmark taken while standing still after entering through the exit
chore(version): Bump version, edit changelog
bugfix: Remove stray benchmark code

MESSAGE.value:
feat(PortalOcclusionCuller): Keep last camera check's visible tiles t… …o reduced SetActive calls
Before this change, we disable all the visible tiles from a previous camera check, and enable all found visible tiles in the current one.
This may produce calls where a tile is set to invisible and immediately set to visible in the same call.
With this change, we store the visible tiles from the previous check, so we can skip the tiles whose visibility didn't change.
Benchmark:
Setup: LC_Office with map seed 1 on Experimentation (Eclipsed); Entered through main entrance; Stay idle throughout benchmark.
Previous method: 345.38 stopwatch ticks per 20037 calls Current method: 206.89 stopwatch ticks per 20037 calls
Improvement: 40.09%
bugfix: When splitting a comma-separated string, trim spaces, then quotation marks
feat(Config): Include internal fallback list in InteriorsToSkipFallbackPortals description

refactor: Change AlwaysLog to LogAlways
This ensures naming consistency across the three logging methods

feat(Config): Force migration if version file doesn't exist
This defaults the version to 0.0.0, since the version file doesn't exist prior to this version

bugfix(Config): When migrating settings, read version from the assembly directory instead of vendor-provided path
This fixes a "path not found issue" when the mod is installed manually, due to us using a scaffolded directory provided by mod management tools.

chore(syntax): Format Config.cs
The previous commit had similar code aligned, which isn't consistent with the rest of the project.
refactor: In TeleportExtender.cs, rename playerGameplayCameraFarPlanes to _playerGameplayCameraFarPlanes for naming consistency
feat: Remove unused ObjectsInsideFactory field and related operations
feat: Only allocate a new float array to _initialPlayerCameraFarPlanes if it's null

refactor(initialization): Remove TileContentsBuilder, move tile content collection logic to TileContents
This allows for less memory allocation during the tile collection step.
refactor: Move TileContentsBuilder to its own file

bugfix: Add null checks for lights and renderers
This fixes an issue on LCOffice where a renderer might get destroyed after generation
Benchmark: With null checks: `251.8254ms` / `10000 camera renders` Without null checks: `247.6951ms` / `10000 camera renders`
Difference: -1.67%
Setup: - Moon: Titan - Seed: 1 - Dungeon: LCOffice (v1.0.16) - Office Length Override: 20 - Benchmark taken while standing still after entering through the exit
